The Event class represents a single event on the app.

Default constructor required for calls to DataSnapshot.getValue(Event.class)
Event(String, String, String, int, int, Date, boolean) - Constructor for class com.example.eventmaster.Event
Constructs a new Event object with all the details This constructor initializes the event with the given name, description, device ID, capacity for the event, capacity for the waitlist, the date the event closes, and whether it has geolocation enabled.
